node.title: Pilot critically injured after plane crashes in north-eastern Tasmania
node.alt: A field with various vehicles in the distance
node.description: A man is critically injured when the plane he is piloting crashes into a paddock whilst fighting the Lebrina bushfire in Northern Tasmania.
node.content: ["A man has been critically injured after the plane he was piloting crashed into a paddock whilst fighting the Lebrina bushfire in northern Tasmania.\u00a0", "Emergency services were called to the crash at Pipers Brook Road on Monday afternoon just after 3pm.", "The man was the sole occupant of the aircraft.\u00a0", "Further information about the extent of his injuries has not been provided.\u00a0", "The Fire Service mobilised multiple crews to attend the site.\u00a0", "Tasmania Police said the pilot appeared to have been undertaking bushfire-related work before the crash.\u00a0", "Tasmania Fire Service Acting Deputy Chief Jeff Harper said it was a tragic incident.\u00a0", "\"Our thoughts are also with our people and others who have been working very closely with the man involved to help fight the Lebrina fires,\" Mr Harper said.", "\"We will be working with police, the Australian Transport Safety Bureau and other authorities so that this incident is fully investigated.", "\"It is a very tragic situation, especially because it has involved someone who was working hard to fight the Lebrina fires to keep our community safe.", "\"Understandably, this is a very distressing incident for everyone involved and we will be ensuring our people have access to all available support.\"", "The Lebrina fire has been burning for days, and has destroyed a shed and impacted some plantations, coming close to homes on Saturday night.", "The fire has already burnt more than 1,600 hectares.", "The Fire Service's Gary Johnson said the cause of the bushfire had resulted from a registered burn that got away from the \"very remorseful\" owner, and it had been deemed accidental.", "Mr Johnson said the immediate threat was over for Lebrina residents.\u00a0", "In January 2020, an air tanker fighting fires in New South Wales crashed, killing three people on board.", "Aircraft crashes while\u00a0undertaking firefighting duties were also recorded in New South Wales' Bega Valley in 2020 and on Queensland's Darling Downs in late 2019."]
